name: customer-service-system
description: Customer Service System - 全栈开发环境

scripts.dev:backend-http: cd backend && set FORCE_HTTP=true&& set NODE_ENV=development&& cargo watch --ignore static/uploads --ignore target --ignore "*.db" -x "run --bin customer-service-backend"
scripts.dev:backend-https: cd backend && powershell -Command "$env:NODE_ENV='development'; $env:TLS_MODE='https'; cargo watch --ignore static/uploads --ignore target --ignore '*.db' -x 'run --features https --bin customer-service-backend'"
scripts.dev:https-backend: cd backend && cargo watch --ignore static/uploads --ignore target --ignore "*.db" -x "run --features https"
scripts.dev:https-only: cd backend && cargo watch --ignore static/uploads --ignore target --ignore "*.db" -x "run --features https"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:cross-https: cd backend && cargo zigbuild --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl --features https
scripts.cert:help: echo '🔐 证书生成帮助:' && echo '  开发环境: npm run cert:generate' && echo '  手动生成: openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout key.pem -out cert.pem -days 365 -nodes -subj "/CN=localhost"'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.check: npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend

author: Customer Service Team
